nls.description: When the requisition status is open, it will send a notification
nls.name: Requisition - Opened resource requisition

nls.description:
This resource requisition is now open, and ready to be filled.
Requisition Name: $[requisition.name] Requisition ID: $[Requisitions.requisition_code] Investment Name: $[project_name] Requested By: $[requested_by] Request Start Date: $[request_start] Request End Date: $[request_finish] Created Date: $[Requisitions.created_date] Priority: $[Requisitions.priority_code]
To access the requisition, @[:resource.requisitionProperties!~:~:Click Here]
nls.name: Resource requisition $[requisition.name] is ready to be filled
